mapper.insert: insert into users( username, pwd, region_id, address, phone, email, photo, birth, sex, user_uuid, nickname ) values( #{username}, #{pwd}, #{regionId}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{photo}, substr(#{birth}, 3), #{sex}, #{user_uuid}, #{username} )
mapper.select: select province_id as "provinceId", province_name as "provinceName" from province order by province_id asc;
select region_id as "regionId", province_id as "provinceId", region_name as "regionName" from region order by region_id asc;
